channel.title: Hi i got mod problem yet
channel.description: i still got the mod problem everyone is gettin a mod crown gold crown and i cant see my own crown everyone cant see their own crowns... and i set all their to 0 but keep coming to 3! does anyone knows wats happening???

item.title: Hi i got mod problem yet

item.description:

if they r logged in u cant edit their accounts and change that…and no1 can see theyre own crowns…

yes they can noob
only owners cant see there own crown unless u follow the owners can see there crown tut
